text: Stormbreaker is a 2005 British movie based on the Anthony Horowitz novel Stormbreaker, part of the Alex Rider series of books. == Plot == The plot is the same as the novel. == Changes == There are some changes from the novel. For example, the main bad guy, Sayle, is changed from Lebanese to American, since the actor picked did not have a Lebanese accent. == Other websites == * Category:2005 movies Category:2010s spy movies Category:British spy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Stormbreaker (movie)
